description:
One of Nei Mo Han`s wingmen, he later is put in charge of several assaults upon the rebel forces. He pilots the Heavy Metal Bat-Shu.

During Giwaza`s first assault on Sveto, during which he is part of the vanguard, his Bat-Shu is heavily damaged and he sacrifices himself to save Maph McTomin.
name: Heckler Mauser
